fields.description: The identifier (id) for the app role which is assigned to the principal. This app role must be exposed in the appRoles property on the resource application's service principal (resourceId). If the resource application has not declared any app roles, a default app role ID of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 can be specified to signal that the principal is assigned to the resource app without any specific app roles. Required on create.
fields.name: AppRoleId

fields.description: The time when the app role assignment was created. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z. Read-only.
fields.name: CreatedDateTime

fields.description: The display name of the user, group, or service principal that was granted the app role assignment. Read-only. Supports $filter (eq and startswith).
fields.name: PrincipalDisplayName

fields.description: The unique identifier (id) for the user, security group, or service principal being granted the app role. Security groups with dynamic memberships are supported. Required on create.
fields.name: PrincipalId

fields.description: The type of the assigned principal. This can either be User, Group, or ServicePrincipal. Read-only.
fields.name: PrincipalType

fields.description: The display name of the resource app's service principal to which the assignment is made.
fields.name: ResourceDisplayName

fields.description: The unique identifier (id) for the resource service principal for which the assignment is made. Required on create. Supports $filter (eq only).
fields.name: ResourceId
